parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.04

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Checks if given object can be stored into soldier's vest.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[canAddItemToVest]] item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>s2</name>=<value> unit [[canAddItemToVest]] [item, count] <template><title>Since</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.55.133607</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>y</value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name>p21</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]
</value></part><part><name>p22</name>=<value> [item, count]: [[Array]]
</value></part><part><name>p23</name>=<value> item: [[String]]
</value></part><part><name>p24</name>=<value> count: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name>r2</name>=<value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_item = "HandGrenade";
[[private]] _fits = [[player]] [[canAddItemToVest]] _item;
[[if]] (_fits) [[then]] {
	[[player]] [[addItemToVest]] _item;
} [[else]] {
	[[hint]] "no room!";
};</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[canAdd]], [[canAddItemToBackpack]], [[canAddItemToUniform]]
</value></part></template>

</comment></dl></root>
